message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is the definition of depreciation.

Looking at the cash flow statement in the problem, I can see that there is a line item labeled "Depreciation" under the "Cash Flow From Operating Activities" section. 

The value associated with the "Depreciation" line item is 91505.05 on 2024-02-05.

Therefore, this is the value I need to extract.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '91505.05'}}
```
